strapiPost.title: Bike Rack Brewing Co Hosts Ozark Innovators Networking Happy Hour
strapiPost.content:
Connect with other local entrepreneurs during Startup Junkie's Ozark Innovators Networking Happy Hour this evening, Mar 1, in Bentonville. 

  • Craft libations and ideations: The Happy Hour will last from 5:30p to 7:30p at Bike Rack Brewing's Taproom in 8th Street Market. 
  • Make connections: The event is co-sponsored by BorderCode, a talent recruiter connecting European developers with American startups, and Innoflexion, a leading Silicon Valley software services, and product engineering company. 

Reserve your spot HERE.
